game.name: SUPER ROBOT WARS Y
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 눈 앞의 파멸과 몰려오는 재앙― 숙명을 넘어서라, 강철의 수호자! 슈퍼로봇대전은 다양한 애니메이션에 등장한 로봇들이 작품의 장벽을 넘어 한자리에 모여 공통의 적과 싸우는 시뮬레이션 RPG 시리즈입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Super Robot Wars is a grid-based tactical combat RPG that brings units and pilots from a variety of anime together to battle their mutual foes. Rise, Unite, and Triumph!

reviewHighlights.text: For context, I have completed one run on Expert difficulty, which was almost 50 hours of gameplay, and completed every optional, side, and DLC mission...
Game stopped working all of a sudden. Crashes immediately after launch.
